effect.shortEffect: Damages the attacker for 1/4 its max HP when knocked out by a contact move.
effect.full: When this Pokémon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum HP in damage.

description.diamond-pearl: Damages the foe landing the finishing hit.
description.platinum: Damages the foe landing the finishing hit.
description.heartgold-soulsilver: Damages the foe landing the finishing hit.
description.black-white: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.
description.black-2-white-2: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.
description.x-y: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.
description.sun-moon: Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokémon with a finishing hit.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokémon with a finishing hit.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokémon with a finishing hit.
description.sword-shield: Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokémon with a finishing hit.
